term: Where does Burr stop and what does he do there?
content:
he stops on this island on the middle of the ohio on the outside of cincinnati owned by Herman Blitterhassett
he built a castle on this island
aaron burr stops by this dudeâ€™s house and they form a militia sort of randomly (no one really knows why)
they grow to about 60 men in the militia and they get 13 flatboats that they can float this militia
burr begins to float down the ohio into the mississippi with this strange collaboration of flatboats and men
